nodes.documentation:
Underscore Protocol Ethereum Service used to store the content of
_Prtcl perspectives
nodes.name: Uprtcl

nodes.documentation:
Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer is initialized as null and should
 be updated independently using updateHead(). The contextId is not persisted but emited in the PerspectiveAdded
 event to enable filtering. Validation of the perspectiveId to contextId should be done externally using any
	content addressable	storage solution for the perspectiveId. The perspectiveCid is emited to help perspectiveHash
 reverse mapping
nodes.name: addPerspective

nodes.documentation: Updates the head pointer of a given perspective. Available only to the owner of that perspective.
nodes.name: updateHead

nodes.documentation: Changes the owner of a given perspective. Available only to the current owner of that perspective.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation: Get the perspective owner and head from its ID
nodes.name: getPerspective

nodes.documentation:
Underscore Protocol Ethereum Service used to store the content of
_Prtcl perspectives
nodes.name: Uprtcl

nodes.documentation:
Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer is initialized as null and should
 be updated independently using updateHead(). The contextId is not persisted but emited in the PerspectiveAdded
 event to enable filtering. Validation of the perspectiveId to contextId should be done externally using any
	content addressable	storage solution for the perspectiveId. The perspectiveCid is emited to help perspectiveHash
 reverse mapping
nodes.name: addPerspective

nodes.documentation: Updates the head pointer of a given perspective. Available only to the owner of that perspective.
nodes.name: updateHead

nodes.documentation: Changes the owner of a given perspective. Available only to the current owner of that perspective.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation: Get the perspective owner and head from its ID
nodes.name: getPerspective

addPerspective(bytes32,bytes32,string,ad.notice: Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer is initialized as null and should be updated independently using updateHead(). The contextId is not persisted but emited in the PerspectiveAdded event to enable filtering. Validation of the perspectiveId to contextId should be done externally using any	content addressable	storage solution for the perspectiveId. The perspectiveCid is emited to help perspectiveHash reverse mapping

changeOwner(bytes32,address).notice: Changes the owner of a given perspective. Available only to the current owner of that perspective.

getPerspective(bytes32).notice: Get the perspective owner and head from its ID

updateHead(bytes32,string).notice: Updates the head pointer of a given perspective. Available only to the owner of that perspective.

userdoc.notice: Underscore Protocol Ethereum Service used to store the content of _Prtcl perspectives
